metadata.title: PRIME THREADS 3 Pack: Men's Fleece Casual Lounge Athletic Shorts - SweatShorts for Workout, Running
features: Workout and Play Hard - Our Prime Men’s Shorts are the perfect fleece shorts for working out at the gym, playing basketball at the park or relaxing at home. Comfortably soft, our mens workout shorts are great for active lifestyles, sports and even casual outings with friends.

Functional Athletic Fit - Fitted with an elastic waistband and drawstring, our classic men’s workout shorts provide a comfortable fit that moves with you. Our fleece shorts for men include three pairs of space dye shorts in gray, olive and navy to wear with your favorite shirt or hoodie.

Deep Phone Pockets - Securely carry your phone, keys, wallet and more in the deep side pockets of our mens sweatshorts. The gym shorts also have a single back pocket for stashing small items within easy reach.

Soft and Lightweight - Made with breathable, quick-drying fleece material, the athletic shorts are exceptionally soft and comfortable for all-day wear. The comfy shorts for men are ideal for training, exercise, hiking, cycling and everyday activities.

Carefree Clothing - Great for everyday wear, our athletic shorts for men are machine washable for easy cleaning. Each pair of mens shorts are also durably made to withstand frequent wear and washing without pilling.
description: Functional, stylish and comfy, our Prime mens shorts will become your go-to option for your morning run, for working out at the gym, running errands or simply relaxing on the weekends. Our mens running shorts have an elastic waist with a drawstring for a comfortable fit and plenty of pockets to keep your phone and essential items close at hand.

Available in a shorts multipack in both solid colors and space dye, our mens gym shorts will go great with your favorite tee or tank. One sweat short set includes burgundy, charcoal gray and navy blue shorts. The second set available includes heather gray, olive and mens black shorts to wear to the gym, the pickup basketball game and to work on projects around the house.

Long enough to keep you comfortably covered, our mens gym shorts are made with a soft fleece that is lightweight, breathable and quick-drying. A wide elastic waistband features an integrated drawstring for a secure fit throughout any activity.
Our easy-care summer shorts for men can be machine washed in cold water with like colors and tumble dried.
